mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT etr.company_id, etr.currency_code, etr.request_amount_sum, ebf.flow_amount_sum FROM ( SELECT company_id, currency_code, sum( request_amount ) request_amount_sum FROM exp_tax_report WHERE blend_status = '0' AND STATUS = '0' GROUP BY company_id, currency_code ) etr, ( SELECT company_id, currency_code, sum( flow_amount ) flow_amount_sum FROM exp_bank_flow WHERE blend_status = '0' AND STATUS = '0' GROUP BY company_id, currency_code ) ebf WHERE etr.company_id = ebf.company_id AND etr.currency_code = ebf.currency_code ) tb ORDER BY company_id, currency_code
